Package game.core

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.core.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game.

    • updateMoney

      public void updateMoney(int amount)
      Updates the player's money by the specified amount. If the amount is positive, it also increases the total money earned.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount by which to update the money.

    • updateTeam

      public void updateTeam(Team newTeam)
      Updates the player's team with a new team.
      Parameters:
      newTeam - The new team.

    • deductMoney

      public void deductMoney(int amount)
      Deducts the specified amount of money from the player's total.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to deduct.

    • addToInventory

      public void addToInventory(Items item)
      Adds the specified item to the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add.

    • addToTeam

      public void addToTeam(Athlete athlete)
      Adds the specified athlete to the player's main team.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The athlete to add.

    • getMainTeamSize

      public int getMainTeamSize()

    • getReserveTeamSize

      public int getReserveTeamSize()
      Retrieves the size of the player's reserve team.
      Returns:
      The size of the reserve team.

    • addToMain

      public void addToMain(Athlete selectedAthlete)
      Adds the specified athlete to the player's main team. If the main team is already at the maximum size, the last athlete is moved to the reserve team.
      Parameters:
      selectedAthlete - The athlete to add to the main team.

    • addToReserve

      public void addToReserve(Athlete selectedAthlete)
      Adds the specified athlete to the player's reserve team.
      Parameters:
      selectedAthlete - The athlete to add to the reserve team.

    • swapAthletes

      public void swapAthletes(int indexMain, int indexRes)
      Swaps the athletes at the specified positions between the main team and the reserve team.
      Parameters:
      indexMain - The index of the athlete in the main team.
      indexRes - The index of the athlete in the reserve team.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(int indexPlayer, int indexTeam, int itemIndex)
      Uses the specified item on the specified player in either the main team or the reserve team.
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - The index of the player (athlete) to use the item on.
      indexTeam - Specifies whether the player is in the main team (1) or the reserve team (2).
      itemIndex - The index of the item to use.
